# Student's T

> Student's t distribution.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var t = require( '@stdlib/math/base/dist/t' );
```

#### t

Student's t distribution.

``` javascript
var dist = t;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
